title: skin disappear
body:
I buy the sona's skin from sale.
I play alot with {{champion:37}}  (sona) with this skin until one day i start a game with sona and there was no skin. 
What to do, how to take it back?     
Help please.
[](http://www.filedropper.com/sonaskin)
Tanks.

replies.body:
Hey sigoru! 

There are generally two reasons content is removed from your account - 

1)  If a player participates in Refer-A-Friend fraud to acquire IP or RP, then any champions/skins gifted with this IP or RP are removed.

2)  If a player purchases RP and gifts content with it, and subsequently issues a chargeback for the money spent on that RP, we will remove that content.

If you believe that content you have purchased/received on your account has gone missing and is not due to either of these two scenarios, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  We can look into your account and investigate further!
I feel like we don't see you as much on the forums Katey!  Glad to see you helpin folks out!
I'm around! ^-^ Less so on weekends, and usually more in the mornings!
